languages.text: "Выдвигаю гипотезу, что схизматический раскол в флоте Осознание достиг критической точки. Мои техносоратники подняли оружие друг на друга. Со скорбью заношу данную информацию в архив".
"I hypothesise that the schism within the Cognisance Fleet has reached a climax. My tech-comrades raised arms against one another. It is with sorrow that I register this information in the archive."
languages.original_text: "Выдвигаю гипотезу, что схизматический раскол в флоте Осознание достиг критической точки. Мои техносоратники подняли оружие друг на друга. Со скорбью заношу данную информацию в архив".

traits.locale_text: "I hypothesise that the schism within the Cognisance Fleet reached critical point. My tech-comrades raised arms against one another. It is with sorrow that I register this information with the archive."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “提出假设：真理开拓者舰队内部的分裂已经到达了巅峰，我的技术伙伴们举起武器，自相残杀。我怀着悲痛的心情，将这样的信息记录在案。”
languages.original_text: "I hypothesise that the schism within the Cognisance Fleet has reached a climax. My tech-comrades raised arms against one another. It is with sorrow that I register this information in the archive."

traits.locale_text: “提出假设：真理开拓者舰队内部的分类已经到达了巅峰，我的技术伙伴们举起武器，自相残杀。我怀着悲痛的心情，将这样的信息记录在案。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Je suppose que le schisme au sein de la Flotte de la Connaissance a atteint son paroxysme. Mes technoconfrères se sont soulevés les uns contre les autres. C'est avec tristesse que je consigne cette information dans les archives. »
languages.original_text: "I hypothesise that the schism within the Cognisance Fleet has reached a climax. My tech-comrades raised arms against one another. It is with sorrow that I register this information in the archive."

traits.locale_text: « Je suppose que le schisme au sein de la Flotte de la Connaissance a atteint son paroxysme. Mes technoconfrères se sont soulevés les uns contre les autres. C'est avec tristesse que je consigne cette information dans les archives. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Hipótesis: el cisma de la Flota Conciencia ha alcanzado su punto culminante. Mis tecnocamaradas se enfrentaron entre sí. Con desazón, registro esta información en el archivo».
languages.original_text: "I hypothesise that the schism within the Cognisance Fleet has reached a climax. My tech-comrades raised arms against one another. It is with sorrow that I register this information in the archive."

traits.locale_text: «Hipótesis: el cisma de la Flota Conciencia ha alcanzado su punto culminante. Mis tecnocamaradas se enfrentaron entre sí. Con desazón, registro esta información en el archivo».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「コグニサンス艦隊内の分裂は頂点に達したと自分は推測する。自分の技術同胞は互いに武器を向けた。この情報をアーカイブに登録するのは悲しむべきことだ」
languages.original_text: "I hypothesise that the schism within the Cognisance Fleet has reached a climax. My tech-comrades raised arms against one another. It is with sorrow that I register this information in the archive."

traits.locale_text: 「コグニサンス艦隊内の分裂は頂点に達したと自分は推測する。自分の技術同胞は互いに武器を向けた。この情報をアーカイブに登録するのは悲しむべきことだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ich nehme an, dass die Spaltung innerhalb der Erkenntnisflotte ihren Höhepunkt erreicht hat. Meine Tech-Kameraden erhoben gegeneinander ihre Waffen. Diese Informationen im Archiv löst Bedauern bei mir aus."
languages.original_text: "I hypothesise that the schism within the Cognisance Fleet has reached a climax. My tech-comrades raised arms against one another. It is with sorrow that I register this information in the archive."

traits.locale_text: "Ich nehme an, dass die Spaltung innerhalb der Erkenntnisflotte ihren Höhepunkt erreicht hat. Meine Tech-Kameraden erhoben gegeneinander ihre Waffen. Diese Informationen im Archiv löst Bedauern bei mir aus."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Malumat Filosu bünyesindeki bölünmenin bir çıkmaza evrildiği kanaatindeyim. Tekno yoldaşlarım, silahlarını birbirlerine doğrultmuş olmalılar. Bu bilgiyi üzülerek arşive kaydediyorum."
languages.original_text: "I hypothesise that the schism within the Cognisance Fleet has reached a climax. My tech-comrades raised arms against one another. It is with sorrow that I register this information in the archive."
